exceptions.tactic: apply pos_reif_t in H as [v Hv].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (R : pos n -> X -> Prop), (forall p : pos n, {x : X | R p x}) -> {f : pos n -> X | forall p : pos n, R p (f p)}" on hypothesis of type "forall p : pos n, exists y, R p y".
The reference v was not found in the current environment.

original: intros H. apply pos_reif_t in H as [v Hv]. exists v. intros p. specialize (Hv p) as [y Hy]. apply Hy.
